lessonTitleText: Jesus Heals a Man Who Couldn't Walk
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Why was the house Jesus was in so crowded?
answers: People came to hear him preach
People were hiding from the rain
They were having a dance party
Jesus was giving away food

questions.text: Four men tried to bring their friend to Jesus. What problem did he have?
answers: He couldn't walk
He was blind
He was deaf
He had an evil spirit

questions.text: Why couldn't the four men get inside?
answers: The house was full of people already
The door was locked
Jesus had already left
They forgot to buy a ticket to enter

questions.text: How did the four men get their friend to Jesus?
answers: They dug a hole in the roof and lowered him down
They waited until the house was empty
They carried him through a window
They asked Jesus to come outside

questions.text: What did Jesus say when he saw their faith?
answers: Your sins are forgiven
You will be healed right away
Leave me alone
Go home in peace

questions.text: Why is it easier to say, 'Your sins are forgiven' than 'Pick up your mat and walk'?
answers: You can't see sins being forgiven, so there would be no way to know if you were lying
Because forgiving sins takes less power
Because walking is harder than talking
Because sins are not important

questions.text: What happened when Jesus said, 'Pick up your mat and walk'?
answers: The man was healed and could walk
Nothing happened, so the crowd laughed at Jesus
The man died
The man hopped around on one leg

questions.text: On the Sabbath, why were the Pharisees watching Jesus closely?
answers: To see if he would heal a man with a weak hand
To learn how to heal people
To listen to his teaching
To figure out if he really was the Son of God

questions.text: What happened when Jesus told the man to stretch out his hand?
answers: His weak hand was as good as new
The man tried, but couldn't do it
The hand became worse
The man thought Jesus was making fun of him

questions.text: When Jesus healed the man on the Sabbath, what secret plans did the Pharisees make?
answers: They planned to kill Jesus
They planned to arrest Jesus
They planned to become his disciples
They planned to find out the secret of Jesus' power
